courses.title: Portfolio Website
courses.description: Build a personal portfolio website to showcase your skills, courses, and experience.

courses.title: E-commerce Store
courses.description: Create an online store to sell products and manage transactions securely.

courses.title: Blog Website
courses.description: Develop a blog platform to publish articles, manage content, and engage with readers.

courses.title: Social Media App
courses.description: Build a social networking platform for users to connect, share content, and interact.

courses.title: Event Management System
courses.description: Design an application to organize and manage events, bookings, and attendees.

courses.title: Online Learning Platform
courses.description: Create an e-learning platform to deliver courses, quizzes, and educational content.

courses.title: Job Board Website
courses.description: Develop a job portal to connect job seekers with employers and facilitate job postings.

courses.title: Real Estate Listings
courses.description: Build a platform to list properties for sale or rent with detailed information and media.

courses.title: Online Booking System
courses.description: Create a booking system for appointments, reservations, or ticketing purposes.

courses.title: Forum Platform
courses.description: Develop an online forum for discussions, knowledge sharing, and community building.
